text: An epispore is a reproductive mechanism present in various lichens. These spores aid with reproduction. ==References== * McCune, Bruce, Linda Geiser, Sylvia Duran Sharnoff, Stephen Sharnoff, and Alexander G. Mikulin. Macrolichens of the Pacific Northwest. Corvallis: Oregon State UP, 2009. Print. Category:Fungal morphology and anatomy Category:Germ cells Category:Lichenology
title: Epispore
